author: IGN
description:
Watch the Reveal Trailer for Project Motor Racing, a first-person racing simulation game developed by Straight4 Studios. Players can get a feel for this upcoming cutting-edge racing game set to feature 70+ vehicles from 10 racing classes and 27 track layouts. Project Motor Racing is set to launch in Fall 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ProjectMotorRacing #IGN #Gameplay
title: Project Motor Racing - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Formula Legends, an arcade racer developed by 3D Clouds. Players must balance aspects of competitive racing such as tire wear, fuel consumption, dynamic weather, and more all while engaging with the arcadey moment-to-moment racing style. Take on challenges, get behind the wheel of legendary cars, and master the tracks to secure a first-place victory. Formula Legends is coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#FormulaLegends #Gaming #IGN
title: Formula Legends - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Be hope in times of darkness. Watch the latest Halo Infinite teaser announcing a new Operation. Operation Last Stand begins on May 6, 2025.

#HaloInfinite #Gaming #IGN
title: Halo Infinite - Official 'Ready up, Spartan' Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Demo Launch Trailer for Cast n Chill, a cozy idle pixel-based fishing game developed by Wombat Brawler. Players will explore scenic views, calm lakes, and vibrant countrysides to catch fish. Upgrade gear, reel in legendary fish, and have a good time with man's best friend in company. Cast n Chill is launching in June 2025 with a demo available now for PC (Steam).

#CastNChill #Gaming #IGN
title: Cast n Chill - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Wizordum, a first-person retro-styled shooter developed by Emberheart Games. Players will make use of a vast array of spells, magic items, and weaponry to fight their way through Terrabruma. Embody the role of a mage and locate the source of the Chaos that plagues the lands once and for all. Wizordum is available now for PC (Steam) with a release on consoles later this year.

#Wizordum #Gaming #IGN
title: Wizordum - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A retro shooter inspired by the older Wolfenstein and Doom games. A tribute of sorts, if you like, where I aspire emulate the games I love the most and that requires a certain amount of skill to complete, while adding a few personal and more current-day touches.
Head over to Steam and add Karkenstein 3D to your wishlist.

#Darkenstein3D #Gaming #IGN
title: Darkenstein 3D - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Happy Star Wars Day 2025' Video in celebration of May the 4th, also known as Star Wars Day. Take a look at iconic scenes from all across Star Wars from its debut in 1977 to the latest season of Andor. Fans can get their Star Wars fill on Disney Plus.

#StarWars #MayThe4ThBeWithYou #IGN
title: Star Wars - Official 'Happy Star Wars Day 2025' Video

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Announcement Trailer for Okko The Exiled, a 2D side-scrolling action platformer developed by Frozen Flame Interactive. Players will traverse through a Kutala, a land of demons, and overthrow the Demon Lord Yalda. Fight, platform, and more to link Okko's world with the heavens once and for all. Okko The Exiled is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#OkkoTheExiled #Gaming #IGN
title: Okko The Exiled - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Reveal Trailer for Easy Delivery Co., a relaxing open-world driving game developed by Sam C. Players will make deliveries in an eerie scenic mountain town. Meet the residents of this quiet town all while getting a feeling of something being a bit off. Easy Delivery Co. is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#EasyDeliveryCo #Gaming #IGN
title: Easy Delivery Co. - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The NWM ONE headphones are the COMPLETE opposite of AirPods Max, Sony WH-1000XM5, or Bose QuietComfort. Instead of blocking the world, they use PSZ (Personal Sound Zone) tech to give you music without sealing your ears. Perfect for gamers, office workers, runners, and anyone who hates being cut off from reality. But are they worth $299? Nick Maillet, Akeem Lawanson, and Michael Higham go hands-on with their first impressions on these interesting new-ish headphones!

#NWMOneHeadphones #Gaming #IGN
title: No Noise Cancelling? GOOD. Unboxing the nwm One Headphones & First Impressions

author: IGN
description:
She continues to dream. Watch the surreal Nidana announcement trailer for this upcoming first-person dream simulator where you explore a corner of a dream. Nidana will be available on Steam in 2025.

#Nidana #Gaming #IGN
title: Nidana - Official Announcement Trailer
